attributes.additional_details:
http://www.thetelegraphandargus.co.uk/news/11450438.Government_warns_city_s_unemployed___Look_for_work_from_nine_to_five_or_face_losing_benefits_/

Having read the above article, I find these lengths to be completely insane!

So let the government body/MP who came up with this scheme lead by example!

Have them move to Bradford.
Give them the average savings of an unemployed Bradfordian
Have them only use the money from these savings and JSA

I would love to see how long these people survive! These people have no idea how bad prospects are for so many, and the only way they will see this is if they live it!
